solution_line_template: 500 grams is {meat_quantity_kg} kilogram, so for the meat, Martha needs to pay {meat_quantity_kg} * {meat_cost_per_kg} = ${meat_cost}.
For the cheese, Martha needs to pay {cheese_quantity_kg} * {cheese_cost_per_kg} = $<<{cheese_quantity_kg}*{cheese_cost_per_kg}={cheese_cost}>>{cheese_cost}.
So in total for the ingredients, Martha needs to pay {meat_cost} + {cheese_cost} = $<<{meat_cost}+{cheese_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
